summary:
Here is a summary of the document in 3-5 sentences, focusing on the main topic and key concepts:

This document provides guidance for creating investigators in the Call of Cthulhu role-playing game. To create an investigator, players can choose from various characteristics, such as ideology, significant people, and places, and roll dice to determine specific details. The characteristics can be used to create a unique and personalized investigator, with options ranging from religious beliefs to personal relationships and places of significance. The document also provides guidance on how to determine the significance of certain people or places to the investigator, adding depth and complexity to the character.
